title: Cz-Silk
author: Cz-Silk
content: I recently synchronized a lightning network node using umbrel application store, I have already fully synchronized my bitcoin node, and opened a random channel with another user in the mempool, my difficulty when I generate a new address for deposit via lightning network, when I transfer from another wallet Lightning wallet always gives error when routing the payment, can someone help me how to solve this?

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: Cz-Silk on June 17, 2023, 02:24:22 PMI recently synchronized a lightning network node using umbrel application store, I have already fully synchronized my bitcoin node, and opened a random channel with another user in the mempool, my difficulty when I generate a new address for deposit via lightning network, when I transfer from another wallet Lightning wallet always gives error when routing the payment, can someone help me how to solve this?this belongs in a different sectiongive me a minute  I will find the section.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=6.0I asked mods to move to technical section.

comments.author: Cz-Silk
comments.body: Quote from: philipma1957 on June 17, 2023, 02:39:27 PMQuote from: Cz-Silk on June 17, 2023, 02:24:22 PMI recently synchronized a lightning network node using umbrel application store, I have already fully synchronized my bitcoin node, and opened a random channel with another user in the mempool, my difficulty when I generate a new address for deposit via lightning network, when I transfer from another wallet Lightning wallet always gives error when routing the payment, can someone help me how to solve this?this belongs in a different sectiongive me a minute  I will find the section.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=6.0I asked mods to move to technical section.thanks

comments.author: nc50lc
comments.body: Quote from: Cz-Silk on June 17, 2023, 02:24:22 PM-snip-, when I transfer from another wallet Lightning wallet always gives error when routing the payment, can someone help me how to solve this?Since the channel has just opened, I assume that it doesn't have enough "inbound liquidity".If so, follow this guide for ways to be able to receive bitcoins through your channel,link: https://community.getumbrel.com/t/how-to-get-incoming-liquidity-for-your-bitcoin-lighthing-network-node/5492

comments.author: Bittothefuture
comments.body: Quote from: Cz-Silk on June 17, 2023, 02:24:22 PMI recently synchronized a lightning network node using umbrel application store, I have already fully synchronized my bitcoin node, and opened a random channel with another user in the mempool, my difficulty when I generate a new address for deposit via lightning network, when I transfer from another wallet Lightning wallet always gives error when routing the payment, can someone help me how to solve this?you most likelye need to open more channels with other well connected nodes if you are having issues routing the payment.
